intent_atoms.description: Establish an automated GitHub Actions workflow that builds and tests the ISOInspector Swift package on every pull request so regressions are blocked before merge.
Workflow triggers on pull requests to the default branch.
Jobs execute swift test (and swift build if separated) against all targets without manual intervention.
Workflow fails the PR when tests fail.
Basic caching or toolchain version pinning prevents unnecessary redownloads (optional but recommended for stability).
CI must run on pull requests and gate merges on failures.
Use swift-actions/setup-swift for toolchain installation to match Linux container environment.
Start with Ubuntu runners; macOS jobs optional later.
Surface build logs via --enable-test-discovery default behavior; attach artifacts only if job logs become unwieldy.

functional_units.name: GitHub Actions CI Workflow
functional_units.description: Automated workflow that builds and tests the ISOInspector Swift package on every pull request to ensure regressions are blocked before merge.

functional_units.name: Swift Toolchain Setup Step
functional_units.description: Installs a specific Swift toolchain (5.9+) using swift-actions/setup-swift for consistent build environment.

functional_units.name: Source Code Checkout Step
functional_units.description: Checks out repository code into the workflow runner.

functional_units.name: Dependency Caching Step
functional_units.description: Caches the .build directory and other dependencies to speed up subsequent runs.

functional_units.name: Build Job/Step
functional_units.description: Executes swift build on all package targets, optionally separated from test execution.

functional_units.name: Test Job/Step
functional_units.description: Runs swift test against all package targets, capturing failures for PR status checks.

functional_units.name: Status Check Configuration
functional_units.description: Configures required status checks so that the pull request fails if CI jobs fail.

functional_units.name: Artifact Logging Step
functional_units.description: Captures and surfaces build/test logs as workflow artifacts or console output for debugging.

functional_units.name: Linting Stub Step
functional_units.description: Optional placeholder step with TODO comments for future linting/static analysis integration.
